refund.title: Refund Policy

refund.section1_para2: All refunds are subject to verification and must be requested within the specified timeframes.

refund.section2_4_cond1: Professional inspection identifies major safety issues
refund.section2_4_cond3: Cost of repairs exceeds 10% of purchase price
refund.section3_intro: Refunds will NOT be granted in the following circumstances:

refund.section5_step4_item3: Confirmation email sent with transaction details

purchase.title: Purchase Agreement
purchase.subtitle: Standard Vehicle Purchase Agreement Template
purchase.intro: This Purchase Agreement is automatically generated for each transaction on AutoScout24 SafeTrade. It constitutes a legally binding contract between the Buyer and Seller, with AutoScout24 SafeTrade acting as the escrow agent and facilitator.
purchase.header_intro: This Vehicle Purchase Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into on the date of payment initiation ("Effective Date") by and between:
purchase.header_intro_label: This Vehicle Purchase Agreement ("Agreement") is entered into on the date of payment initiation ("Effective Date") by and between:
purchase.section1_intro: The Seller agrees to sell and the Buyer agrees to purchase the following vehicle ("Vehicle"):
purchase.section1_intro_label: The Seller agrees to sell and the Buyer agrees to purchase the following vehicle ("Vehicle"):
purchase.section4_intro: The Seller represents and warrants that:
purchase.section4_item1: The Seller has legal title to the Vehicle and right to sell it
purchase.section4_item2: The Vehicle is free from liens, encumbrances, or legal claims
purchase.section4_item3: All information provided in the listing is accurate and truthful
purchase.section4_item4: The Vehicle has not been reported stolen or salvaged
purchase.section4_item5: The mileage stated is accurate to the best of Seller's knowledge
purchase.section4_item6: All known defects and issues have been disclosed
purchase.section4_item7: The Vehicle will be delivered in the condition described
purchase.section4_item8: All necessary documentation for transfer will be provided
purchase.section5_item1: Complete payment as specified in this Agreement
purchase.section5_item2: Inspect the Vehicle within 7 business days of payment
purchase.section5_item3: Provide formal acceptance or rejection within the inspection period
purchase.section5_item4: Arrange vehicle pickup or delivery within 14 days of acceptance
purchase.section5_item5: Complete all registration and transfer procedures
purchase.section5_item7: Pay all applicable taxes and registration fees
purchase.section8_1_item5: Bill of sale signed by both parties
purchase.section15_intro: By clicking "Accept and Pay" on the AutoScout24 SafeTrade platform, both Buyer and Seller electronically sign this Agreement and acknowledge that they have read, understood, and agree to all terms.
purchase.notice_text: This is a legally binding contract. Both parties should review all terms carefully before proceeding. If you have questions, consult with a legal professional. Electronic signatures carry the same legal weight as handwritten signatures under EU eIDAS Regulation.
purchase.section3_1_value: Payment shall be made via bank transfer to the AutoScout24 SafeTrade escrow account.
purchase.section3_2_value: Funds will be held in escrow until the Buyer completes vehicle inspection and provides formal acceptance.
purchase.section3_3_value: Upon Buyer acceptance, funds will be released to Seller within 2 business days, minus applicable service fees.
purchase.section3_4_value: If Buyer rejects the Vehicle for valid reasons as outlined in the Refund Policy, a full refund will be processed.
purchase.section6_1_value: Buyer has 7 business days from payment date to inspect the Vehicle.
purchase.section6_2_value: Inspection shall take place at [Inspection Location] or as mutually agreed.
purchase.section6_3_value: Buyer may hire an independent mechanic for professional inspection at Buyer's expense.
purchase.section6_4_value: Buyer is permitted a reasonable test drive under Seller supervision.
purchase.section7_1_value: Buyer must formally accept the Vehicle through the platform within the inspection period.
purchase.section7_2_value: If the Vehicle does not match the description or has undisclosed issues, Buyer may reject it and receive a full refund.
purchase.section7_3_value: Failure to respond within the inspection period constitutes acceptance.
purchase.section7_4_value: Upon acceptance, the sale is final (subject to Refund Policy conditions).
purchase.section8_2_value: Both parties shall complete all necessary paperwork to legally transfer ownership.
purchase.section8_3_value: Risk of loss and liability transfers to Buyer upon acceptance and vehicle delivery.
purchase.section9_1_value: Vehicle shall be delivered within 14 days of acceptance.
purchase.section9_4_value: [To be paid by Buyer / Seller / Shared]
purchase.section10_1_value: The Vehicle is sold "AS-IS, WHERE-IS" with all faults, except as specifically disclosed.
purchase.section10_2_value: Seller provides no warranty beyond the representations in Section 4.
purchase.section10_3_value: Buyer accepts full responsibility for the Vehicle's condition after acceptance.
purchase.section11_1_value: Buyer may cancel before inspection with forfeiture of service fees.
purchase.section11_2_value: If Seller cancels after payment, Buyer receives full refund plus €100 compensation, and Seller pays penalty fee.
purchase.section11_3_value: Both parties may agree to cancel with terms to be negotiated.
purchase.section12_1_value: Any disputes shall first be submitted to AutoScout24 SafeTrade's dispute resolution system.
purchase.section12_2_value: If mediation fails, disputes shall be resolved through binding arbitration.
purchase.section12_3_value: This Agreement is governed by Romanian and EU law.
purchase.section13_1_value: AutoScout24 SafeTrade acts as a marketplace facilitator and escrow agent only.
purchase.section13_2_value: AutoScout24 SafeTrade is not a party to this sale and makes no warranties about the Vehicle.
purchase.section13_3_value: AutoScout24 SafeTrade will provide mediation services as outlined in the Terms of Service.
purchase.section14_1_value: This Agreement, together with the platform Terms of Service, constitutes the entire agreement.
purchase.section14_2_value: Any modifications must be in writing and agreed by both parties.
purchase.section14_3_value: If any provision is invalid, the remainder shall remain in effect.
purchase.section14_4_value: This Agreement may not be assigned without written consent of both parties.
